Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
@ Part of previous ODC207, which perfoms database updates, see SCR 5825
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
05.05.2011 SH SCR16446 Replaced table CURR by CURA
23.03.2011 JOH SCR16306 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and
GB002 by GB902
11.12.2010 GB SCR16059 Added condition for call the part 3. Add row in
07.04.2010 GB SCR15441 Added the part 4. Add row in SILO (to check finance)
31.03.2010 GB SCR15426 Chnged condition for section "Perform tests"
30.12.2009 GB SCR15207 Added the part 3. Add row in DEBTOR_HELLER_INFOCODE
26.07.2005 SH SCR8689 Fixed bug according to currency recalculation, in task
"Check DEBC"
-- Reset virtuals
-- Check mandatory fields, always have be in file, else error
-- Check Currency-Code
-- Check Reinsurance-Code
-- Check Reinsurance-Limstart in mandatory
-- Check DEBC-Rows
-- If no errors --> Perfrom database updates
There is the part 3. Add row in DEBTOR_HELLER_INFOCODE in
the task Update Debtor-Client
-- Field which have to be always updated

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Limit already exists for the requested amount')

Text.val: @INFO: SORT of DEBC = desc DEBC_CREDITLIMIT, because if multiple rows exists
a row has to be used where DEBC_CREDITLIMIT > 0
-- Debtor exists
-- Recalculte Reinsurance-Limit to ADMN currency, same currency as used in T203
-- Uses for database updates, see further handling
3. Add row in DEBTOR_HELLER_INFOCODE
4. Add row in SILO (to check finance)
... only if all T203 rows were handeld
